Title: Love Comes Quietly
Writer: André Kuyten, Nikolai van der Heyde
Actors: Sandy van der Linden, Barbara Hershey, Ralph Meeker, Ward de Ravet
Plot: An American returns to his native Dutch village in the nineteen thirties and causes a sensation there. When his pregnant daughter starts an affair with the son of the local cheese-factory owner, the conservative village starts to despise the hippie-girl.
